question: What is the entry fess for entering into the 16th century monument's main mausoleum of Taj Mahal?
explanation: The Union Minister of culture Mahesh Sharma announced that from April 1, domestic tourists visiting the Taj Mahal will have to pay Rs 50 to enter the premises and pay an additional Rs 200 to gain entry into the 16th century monument's main mausoleum and the tomb in the basement. And he said, for better crowd management, the government has also decided to limit the validity of all tickets to three hours. Tourists who stay inside the monument longer than three hours will have to pay the entry fee once again.
